item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Lorraine - No, thank you for your lovely blog. It's one which really inspired me to make my own :P ... and yes, everyone knows "Blue Steel" hehehe
Hi Simon - Ahahahahahaha - I love it!! :) (and say that line ... all the time!!)
Hi Zita - hehehe, hope you get it soon!
Hi Julia - You're welcome, I really enjoy your blog, especially the beautiful macarons!
Hi Steph - I think I have to try the mousse cake... how could I not?? :)
Hi Beta Gal - Thanks, I was happy Julie won, she was lovely and did very well in the final.
Hi Arwen - You're Welcome Arwen! Thanks for sharing your lovely Gluten free recipes and exciting food adventures!
Hi Parita - Thanks so much! That's very lovely. I love your blog and you certainly deserve it! Hope your tooth ache has gone away - sorry for my late response too.
Hi Maria - One day..... hopefully.... :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Lorraine – No, thank you for your lovely blog. It’s one which really inspired me to make my own üòõ … and yes, everyone knows “Blue Steel” hehehe

Hi Simon – Ahahahahahaha – I love it!! üôÇ (and say that line … all the time!!)

Hi Zita – hehehe, hope you get it soon!

Hi Julia – You’re welcome, I really enjoy your blog, especially the beautiful macarons!

Hi Steph – I think I have to try the mousse cake… how could I not?? üôÇ

Hi Beta Gal – Thanks, I was happy Julie won, she was lovely and did very well in the final.

Hi Arwen – You’re Welcome Arwen! Thanks for sharing your lovely Gluten free recipes and exciting food adventures!

Hi Parita – Thanks so much! That’s very lovely. I love your blog and you certainly deserve it! Hope your tooth ache has gone away – sorry for my late response too.

Hi Maria – One day….. hopefully…. üôÇ

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: I unfortunately suffer from the same cruse you have in point number 4. Maybe one day right, a girl can only dream!
item.content:encoded: I unfortunately suffer from the same cruse you have in point number 4. Maybe one day right, a girl can only dream!

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: Hey Anita, sorry for the delay dear :((( having bad tooth ache these days :( CONGRATULATIONS for the award dear, i cant think of anyone who deserves this more than you, i adore your blog and i really think you make some very innovative dishes which i thouroughly enjoy :)) Keep going girlie, wish u lots many awards! THANK YOU SOOOOOO much for nominating me...I am sooo very glad you like my blog, thank you again for your encouragement!
item.content:encoded:
Hey Anita, sorry for the delay dear :((( having bad tooth ache these days üôÅ
CONGRATULATIONS for the award dear, i cant think of anyone who deserves this more than you, i adore your blog and i really think you make some very innovative dishes which i thouroughly enjoy :)) Keep going girlie, wish u lots many awards!
THANK YOU SOOOOOO much for nominating me…I am sooo very glad you like my blog, thank you again for your encouragement!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Congratulations on your nomination! What did you think about the Master Chef finale? I was glad that Julie won, she was sweet.
item.content:encoded: Congratulations on your nomination! What did you think about the Master Chef finale? I was glad that Julie won, she was sweet.

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: You're very welcome! I was so impressed with your croquembouche, are you going to try the mousse cake? ;)
item.content:encoded: You’re very welcome! I was so impressed with your croquembouche, are you going to try the mousse cake? üòâ

item.title: By: Julia @ M√©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ M√©langer
item.description: Thanks Anita. Such a lovely thought. Much appreciated! :) I loved Masterchef, too. Now.....I have to think of some interesting things about me!!!!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Anita. Such a lovely thought. Much appreciated! üôÇ I loved Masterchef, too. Now…..I have to think of some interesting things about me!!!!

item.title: By: Simon Food Favourites
item.dc:creator: Simon Food Favourites
item.description: What is this? A center for ants? How can we be expected to teach children to learn how to read... if they can't even fit inside the building?
item.content:encoded: What is this? A center for ants? How can we be expected to teach children to learn how to read… if they can’t even fit inside the building?

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description:
Aww thankyou so much Anita! That's so sweet of you to give me one :)
I love Zoolander too. I love how you can just say "Blue Steel" and people know what you're talking about!
item.content:encoded:
Aww thankyou so much Anita! That’s so sweet of you to give me one üôÇ

I love Zoolander too. I love how you can just say “Blue Steel” and people know what you’re talking about!
